features: Antispill Steamer – Garment Steamer Pump System produce fast Dry Steam. Closed Water Tank allows Clothing Steamer work at any Angle & excludes possibility of irritating Water Spills, Drops or Spitting
Fast & Safe – 950W Iron Steamer preheats in 25S for up to 12Min continuous steaming. Cooling Touch System prevents Handle from heat up. Safe Auto-Off Element switches Steamer off in 2 Min. out of use
Compact & Portable – Portable Steamer has original one-touch removable Water Tank. For constant steam flows just switch Travel Steamer on. Travel Steamer is very compact: 7.8x3.5x 4” & light: 1.2lb

Multi-Tasks Steamer – Garment Steamer for Clothes works on any Fabrics: cotton, wool, polyester, plush, silk, linen, sequins, embroidery est. Plus Fabric Steamer can be used as universal Steam Cleaner

Perfect Gift & Guarantee – Compact Portable Travel-friendly Wrinkle Steamer for Clothes is Perfect Gift Idea. Plus we are confidently providing on Steamer 1-year Warranty w/ Replacement or Full Refund
body.description: "FAST & CONVENIENT SHARP CREASES & WRINKLE-FREE CLOTHES WITH PROFESSIONAL RESULTS AT HOME – WITH NEW GARMENT STEAMER THAT’S REALITY! This small personal steamer will help you quickly & w/ minimum affords steam out any wrinkles & create perfect & glamorous Look for your clothes at home or during any business trip or holiday. KEY FEATURES OF CLOTHING STEAMER CATER TO PEOPLE WITH DIFFERENT NEEDS & HIGH STANDARDS: DRY STEAM W/ ANTISPILL DESIGN: Newest Electronic Pump System exclude possibility of irritating water spills, drops & spitting 360° ROTATION: Can be used as a horizontal & vertical steamer 100% SURFACES PROTECTION: No iron burns & scorch marks POWERFUL: 950W FAST: fabric steamer preheats in 25 seconds for up to 12 minutes steaming SAFE COOLING TOUCH SYSTEM: Prevents handle from heat up AUTO-OFF: Switching fabric steamer off in 2 minutes out of use AUTOMATIC STANDBY SYSTEM: Plugged in handheld steamer not consuming energy in off mode & fast starting after a break CONVENIENT: One-touch removable water tank & handy steam lock makes it easy to operate w/ one hand COMPACT: 7.8x3.5x 4” LIGHTWEIGHT: 1.2lb PORTABLE: Travel-friendly portable steamer can be easily packed it in any suitcase or rucksack WORKS PERFECT ON ANY FABRICS: Cotton, wool, polyester, plush, silk, fiber, velvet satin, linen, nylon blends, sequins, embroidery & beads MULTI-TASKS: Can be used as a steam cleaner for mattress, pillows, sofas, cushions, curtains, & children’s toys & unpleasant odors PERFECT GIFT IDEA: Will help your friends & relatives get rid of any wrinkles on any kind of fabrics FAST & CONVENIENT SHARP CREASES & WRINKLE-FREE CLOTHES WITH PROFESSIONAL RESULTS AT HOME – WITH NEW GARMENT STEAMER THAT’S REALITY! This small personal steamer will help you quickly & w/ minimum

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this steamer. Purchased this to take with me yo Hawaii for our 25th anniversary wedding vow renewal. It worked so good my sister ordered one when we arrived back home. Don’t hesitate please buy. Great product. Compact and works great on my wedding dress

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Packs a punch on wrinkles WOW
reviews.reviewText: This compact steamer packs a punch on wrinkles like the big bulky floor machine that you pull around but with out the inconvenience of one including storing it.Easy to use. Is fantastic with wrinkles. Have not traveled with it yet but it’s light weight and compact. It comes with a storage bag. The cord is close to 92 inches. I’m not easily impressed with gadgets but this is worth spreading the word.I’ve bought this compact steamer to iron out the more than several long winter coats I own and was dreading buying that large floor steamer model I used to own and decided to give this compact steamer a try and I must say it functioned exactly like a high power floor model streamer and what a gem it is to any wardrobe.Highly recommend.The only difference between the large floor model and this is compact steamer is you will need to fill this up with water several more times but well worth it by me!This will be my to go last minute for wrinkle issues.Amazon thanks for offering the review system on products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2019
reviews.reviewText: From my wife:Used for the first time today and am very happy with it. It heated up and was ready to use in literally seconds, and worked rapidly. My old steamer took several passes to get wrinkles out. Each pass of this little powerhouse ERASED all the wrinkles. The wide head covered a lot of ground quickly. The unit is easy to hold and lightweight even when full, which I was looking for. It came with a nice sturdy travel/storage bag, and a coordinating Velcro tie already in place on the cord. I wasn’t looking for aesthetics, but found the clean lines are very pleasing and easy on the eye! The only reason I gave it 4 stars rather than 5 is that the silicone plug for the water tank looks very delicate, and I’m not sure how I will replace it if it breaks (and I anticipate “when” rather than “if”). Being silicone rather than rubber, I hope it will last a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: Steamer is easy to fill, takes seconds to heat up and was super gentle on my silk shirts for a long weekend away from home. I filled it twice for three shirts, (one tank, one short sleeve, one long sleeve). It’s also got a long cord for easy use. Would absolutely recommend for a handheld/travel item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic for traveling and for small jobs around house.
reviews.reviewText: I successfully used this on three different Halloween costumes over the past couple years with quite a bit of success. It makes an out of the package costume come fully back to life, if you have a good 15-20 minutes to spend on it. Game changer for those, hands down.This past Fall I brought it on a Vegas trip with my girlfriends and they were shocked how well it worked on some of our more formal attire, helping us clean up our wrinkled travel look. Since we don't often require this type of maintenance around the house, it's nice that it doesn't take up a huge amount of space and can travel really well. I would highly recommend this item! Great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This steamer does not last long.
reviews.reviewText: I loved this little steamer. The first one I bought lasted only a year but I liked it so much that I thought I'd try purchasing it again since it had such great reviews. The second I bought I only used about 4 or 5 times and it stopped working again within 4 months of purchase. I would not buy this item again, nor would I recommend it to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best steamer out there!!
reviews.reviewText: We took this steamer on our first cruise last week and it works even better than ironing!! Heats up super fast, no spitting water on your garment. Light weight. Steamed a long dress with only one fill of the water tank. My daughter loved it so much, she nabbed it for every day use ;). I will be buying another for my home use when back in stock.

reviews.reviewerName: do a barrel rolldo a barrel roll
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product! Highly recommend
reviews.reviewText: This product works very well! I really liked how easy to use it was, it only takes like 10 seconds to warm up so it's super quick. I'll even use this at home instead of an iron and ironing board cause it's way more convenient! It does the job quick. These are two different types of material and I only steamed each for about a minute and it got the wrinkles out great. An amazing idea to have this for traveling especially if you are somewhere for an occasion where you don't want to be wrinkly! Highly recommend.
